Number of possible different notes (i.e. the number of rows in the grid)
Maximum length of a sequence (i.e. the number of columns in the grid)
Number of notes in the sequence of the first bacterium in the colony
Chance of each new bacterium having a mutation from its parent

Maximum age of a bacterium (in seconds) before it splits
(mean age should be half of this value)

Period (in seconds) at the beginning of the game during which bacteria
will always spawn immediately if there is only one active strain
(player must survive past this phase to beat the game).
